sentences.english: Bonobos have developed a set of ritualized socio-sexual behaviors that are specific to their species.
sentences.chinese: 倭黑猩猩已經形成了一套自己獨特的社交性行爲。

sentences.english: Glass and a Half Full Productions, home of Cadbury Dairy Milk, the gorilla and trucks.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃和半飽製作，吉百利牛奶，大猩猩和卡車回家。

sentences.english: Orangutan mothers face up to eight years of single parenthood raising their infants.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩母親則要做長達八年的獨自養育幼兒的單親家長。

sentences.english: Supposing that the chimpanzees were to be civilized by us, would they be happer for it?
sentences.chinese: 就算咱們把猩猩都開化了，它們因此更幸福嗎？

sentences.english: The ape apes the ape-man in everything he does.
sentences.chinese: 大猩猩一切都模仿猿人。

sentences.english: Orang are currently on the verge of extinction wildly.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩現在面臨着在野外滅絕的境地。

sentences.english: Is Rollie an exception, or are all gorillas as clever?
sentences.chinese: 羅妮是個特例，還是所有的大猩猩都一樣聰明？

sentences.english: So, both humans and chimpanzees, for instance, are particularly prone to develop fears of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 例如，人類和黑猩猩，特別容易對蛇產生恐懼感。

sentences.english: But she brought the plight of the gorillas to everyone's attention.
sentences.chinese: 但是她讓每個人開始關注大猩猩的困境。

sentences.english: Goyle has short, bristly hair and long, gorilla-ish arms.
sentences.chinese: 高爾的頭髮短而硬，胳膊很長如猩猩一般。

sentences.english: The six adults rested on the ground or stretched out along the branches of a wild fig.
sentences.chinese: 六隻成年猩猩在地上或野生無花果樹上睡覺休息。

sentences.english: Individual mountain gorillas have never been re-introduced to the wild successfully.
sentences.chinese: 獨個的山地大猩猩從來不能再度在野外成功存活。

sentences.english: Matsuzawa trained chimps to recognize the numbers one through nine.
sentences.chinese: Matsuzawa訓練過猩猩識別一到九的數字。

sentences.english: Soon she attracted the curiosity of the one-year-old baby ape she adopted.
sentences.chinese: 這很快便引起了她收養的一歲小猩猩的好奇。

sentences.english: And in the other room another chimpanzee is placed.
sentences.chinese: 而在那個房間裏有另一隻黑猩猩。

sentences.english: Males prefer to use the sticks to whack each other.
sentences.chinese: 雄性小猩猩則喜歡用棍子互相敲打。

definition: aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
